39.eng-name: The Book on the Description of Hellfire
39.ara-name: كتاب صفة جهنم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Imran bin Husain narrated that the Prophet (s.a.w) said:'A group from my Ummah will depart from the Fire through my intercession, and they will be called the Jahannamiyyun

chapter.eng-name: The Story of the Last of the People of the Fire to Leave It
